short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now you can comment (tweet) on ANY webpage!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wanted to leave a comment on a webpage that doesn't let you?
Well now you can with Tweet The Web.
Navigate to any webpage and then click the TweetTheWeb chrome extension. Read tweets about that page and leave tweets for that page.
Simple as that!
